newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY O/N RATES END STEADY AT 20.625 PERCENT.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY O/N RATES END STEADY AT 20.625 PERCENT.

text.p: Hungary's overnight interest ended at down at 20.25 percent on Tuesday in continued abundant money supply, traders said.
Overnight rates traded between 20.50 and 21.00 percent for most of the session but dipped to 20.25 percent just before the close.
Rates ended on Monday at 20.625 percent.
"There's plenty of liquidity on the market," said Gabor Liener of Unicbank.
Traders said earlier that liquidity on the interbank overnight market rose after the National Bank of Hungary did not cut repo and reverse repo rates as market players had expected.
